channel.title: 2 Questions
channel.description:
I'm new to Mopar and I made a server. Everything worked out fine, but when I use the ::setobject command to switch objects, and restart my server, it dissappears. How do I fix it to where the objects will stay? Are they supposed to go back?
Next question. I've been on a server with custom spell names. How do I change the spell names on my server? Thanks.

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

Thepieman:

Do you know what file the spells are in? Is it client.java?

Yes

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Thepieman Thepieman
item.description:
@Thepieman wrote:

Do you know what file the spells are in? Is it client.java?

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @shadow235 shadow235
item.description:
@shadow235 wrote:

Ok, For the spell names you just need to search the new spell name and replace with the name you desire. Then for the objects I think you need a custom client.

Read full topic
